name: マレニア国の冒険酒場 ～パティアと腹ペコの神～
summary: Patty's brother has been possessed by the God of Poverty and the whole family has become poor. Run an adventure tavern in a fantasy land with Patty to pay their dept! A turn-based RPG where you cook, eat, collect, fight and explore!
info:
• 发行: KEMCO
  • 别名: Marenian Tavern Story: Patty and the Hungry God
  • 别名: 马雷尼亚国的冒险酒馆
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: iOS
  • 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: RPG
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2018年11月9日
  • 售价: ￥70
  • 官方网站: https://www.kemco.jp/game/adventure-bar/ja/index.html
  • 开发: Rideon,Inc.
